intro: Radermachera yunnanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan radermachera, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Sapindaceae and is characterized by its glossy, heart-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pink in color. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and ease of care. Radermachera yunnanensis prefers bright, indirect light and well-draining soil for optimal growth.
